name: The Night of the Sweet Soul
name_original: The Night of the Sweet Soul
description:
The Night of the Sweet Soul

The evening of Halloweens, ghosts feels the streets, their souls will make perfect candies for the children.

You only can attack ghosts by behind, and the same applies to them.

CONTROLS : Keyoard :

[Left]/[Right] : Move
[Up] : Jump
[X]: Attack

Gamepad :

[L-Stick] : Move
[A] : Jump
[X] : Attack

A game made in 48h for the Spooky 2D Jam 2021
Music by PeriTune
